metadata.greeting: Hey George! Get ready for a weekend packed with adventures! We've got DLR rides, farm animals, and even a chance to see some HUGE dinosaurs – ROAR!

activities.title: Muddy Fun at Hackney City Farm
activities.description: Get up close with pigs, goats, donkeys, and chickens! Perfect for getting muddy and meeting friendly farm animals.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: You can see real farm animals and maybe even get your boots muddy!

transport.fromHackney: Walk, cycle, or take the 394/26 bus
transport.tip: Look out for the pottery workshops!

activities.title: DLR Adventure to Mudchute Farm
activities.description: Take a DLR ride to the biggest urban farm in Europe! See llamas, cows, and other farm animals.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: You can ride the DLR (sit at the front!) and see lots of animals, including llamas!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Stratford, then Jubilee line to Canary Wharf, then DLR to Mudchute
transport.tip: Sit at the front of the DLR for the best views!

activities.title: Digging Fun at Tumbling Bay Playground
activities.description: Tumbling Bay has sand, water, and climbing structures for hours of fun. Great for getting muddy and playing outdoors.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: You can dig in the sand and splash in the water!

transport.tip: Pack a change of clothes – it's easy to get muddy!

activities.title: Storytelling Adventure
activities.description: Interactive storytelling, dressing up, and character visits! A great place to spark your imagination.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: You can dress up and play pretend in amazing story worlds!

transport.tip: Check the website for character visit schedules.

activities.title: Animal Spotting at Clissold Park
activities.description: Visit the animal enclosure with deer and goats, plus enjoy two playgrounds and a lovely cafe.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: You can see deer and goats!

activities.title: Train Spotting and Play at Young V&A
activities.description: Under 5s play area, design workshops, and inspiring exhibits. Great for hands-on learning and play.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: There's a play area just for little ones!

transport.tip: Check the website for workshop schedules.

activities.title: Dinosaur Discovery at the Natural History Museum
activities.description: See a real T-Rex skeleton and learn all about dinosaurs! Explore the amazing dinosaur gallery.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: You can see a HUGE T-Rex!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Highbury & Islington, then Victoria line to South Kensington
transport.tip: Go early to avoid the crowds!

activities.title: All Aboard at the London Transport Museum
activities.description: Climb on old buses and trains, play in the All Aboard zone, and explore the history of London's transport.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: You can climb on real buses and trains!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Highbury & Islington, then Victoria line to Green Park, then Jubilee line to Charing Cross
transport.tip: The All Aboard play zone is perfect for little ones.

activities.title: Flight and Trains at the Science Museum
activities.description: Explore the Garden (under 5s area), see planes in the Flight gallery, and discover trains in Making the Modern World.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: You can see planes and trains!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Highbury & Islington, then Victoria line to South Kensington
transport.tip: The Garden is a great place for little ones to play.

activities.title: Boat Trip to Greenwich
activities.description: Explore ships, play in the AHOY! children's gallery, and enjoy the playground outside.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: You can see real ships and play in a special children's gallery!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Highbury & Islington, then Victoria line to Green Park, then Jubilee to Canary Wharf and then DLR to Cutty Sark
transport.tip: Take the Thames Clipper boat from Tower Pier for a fun ride!

activities.title: Dinosaur Statues at Crystal Palace Park
activities.description: See Victorian dinosaur statues on islands, visit the farm, and explore the maze. A great day out for dinosaur lovers.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: You can see HUGE dinosaur statues!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Shoreditch High Street, then Overground to Crystal Palace
transport.tip: Bring a picnic to enjoy by the dinosaur statues.

bookAhead.title: Book Ahead
bookAhead.subtitle: Coming up in the next 2-8 weeks

activities.title: Hey Duggee Live
activities.description: Join Hey Duggee and the Squirrel Club for a fun-filled live show with singing, dancing, and badge earning!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: It's Hey Duggee, just like on TV!

transport.tip: Book tickets early, as they sell out quickly.

activities.title: Peppa Pig Live
activities.description: Sing and dance along with Peppa Pig and her friends in this interactive live show.

transport.tip: Get ready to sing and dance!

activities.title: Dinosaur World Live
activities.description: See life-size dinosaur puppets come to life on stage in this thrilling show.

transport.tip: Some dinosaurs might be a little scary.

activities.title: The Tiger Who Came to Tea
activities.description: See the classic story come to life on stage with songs, magic, and of course, a very hungry tiger!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: It's the Tiger Who Came to Tea!

transport.tip: Enjoy a cup of tea after the show!

activities.title: Bluey's Big Play
activities.description: Join Bluey and Bingo for a fun-filled adventure in this interactive stage show.

transport.tip: Get ready to play along with Bluey and Bingo!

activities.title: Half Moon Theatre Shows
activities.description: Check out the schedule for upcoming kids shows at this local theatre.

transport.tip: Check the website for age suitability.
